title: If I sell an Islamic book, will I still receive reward if people use it, even though I'm selling it?
transcript: Ali from Pakistan sh my question is like if I'm selling like this uh an Islamic ebook beneficial ebook for example for example like a compilation of the morning and evening atar my question is like if people buy that PDF and use it will I not get the hassat since I selling it like when people recite that car for example or will I get the hassat no this has nothing to do with getting rewarded for saying thear whether you buy the book or you hear it or you memorize it for free it has nothing to do that the reward is there
